name: PONG.EXE (IndieNick)
description:
A version of the good old classic PONG made for the "Yogscast Game Jam 2020", it totally does not contain ANY surprieses WHAT. SO. EVER!
(Minor spoiler, there are no jumpscares incase the fear of that would turn people away from having a go)

Made using Unity

Controls:
Go up        - W / Up arrow 
Go down - S / Down arrow
